channel.title: So far in london
channel.description: So i went to london for 3 days on vacation. today is the second day. i got food poisoning on the plane, there was only one 'toilet' for males in the area of the airport i was in, and it didnt flush. threw up on the train from gatwick airport to my hotel. everything here costs double the price. and i dont mean that the currency is double canadian, i mean double the price. now i ask you, english people hurr, what shall i do on my third day?

item.title: So far in london
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Moparscape424:

trafalger london zoo london aquarium london dungeon tower of london london bridge buckingham palace loads of places just a view here

Those are all places for people of your age…

trafalger london zoo london aquarium london dungeon tower of london london bridge buckingham palace loads of places just a view here
[/quote]
Sdfu.[/quote]

You’re gay.

item.title: So far in london
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:20, topic:119796”]I <3 London.

Prices might be high, but we’re also paid quite a bit. I’ve just started a summer job, and im getting £9 GBP Per hour. Thats about $18 USD per hour.

(Well it is a “specilized” job, but still, its an insanely high salary for a summer job)[/quote]
hmm minimum wage is £5.35, £9 per hour is pretty good. The usual worker between 20-40 years old are usually payed somwhere £15-£30 i believe… although not sure at all

Read full topic

So i went to london for 3 days on vacation. today is the second day. i got food poisoning on the plane, there was only one ‘toilet’ for males in the area of the airport i was in, and it didnt flush. threw up on the train from gatwick airport to my hotel. everything here costs double the price. and i dont mean that the currency is double canadian, i mean double the price. now i ask you, english people hurr, what shall i do on my third day?
[/quote]
Wow, brilliant. Definitely going there one day.

Anyway, go to a good country. Like Australia. :)[/quote]

Why not your home continent of Asia Lothy ?

Mr.Chris:

London is actually a great place. When you walk around, always look up…

Then a pigeon shits in your eye ?

item.title: So far in london
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

lawl:

So i went to london for 3 days on vacation. today is the second day. i got food poisoning on the plane, there was only one ‘toilet’ for males in the area of the airport i was in, and it didnt flush. threw up on the train from gatwick airport to my hotel. everything here costs double the price. and i dont mean that the currency is double canadian, i mean double the price. now i ask you, english people hurr, what shall i do on my third day?

You get your arse in to London. Get on the London Eye, have fun in the Underground for a bit, go to Oxford Street (don’t buy anything cause it’s all too expensive). I think you might need longer than 3 days to experience the full English experience:
People barging in to you on the street
People swearing wherever you go
White people who think they are black
Tramps deciding not to stay awake while they ask you for money (Just put a sign with a bit of string round there neck)

Oh, don’t forget! you cannot experience the full English way without getting knife in your chest by a 13 year old!

Read full topic
